MD5.command: ./ft_ssl md5 -s "pity those that aren't following baerista on spotify."
MD5.expected_stdout: MD5 ("pity those that aren't following baerista on spotify.") = a3c990a1964705d9bf0e602f44572f5f

MD5.command: echo "be sure to handle edge cases carefully" | ./ft_ssl md5 -p /tmp/file
MD5.expected_stdout:
("be sure to handle edge cases carefully\n")= 3553dc7dc5963b583c056d1b9fa3349c
MD5 (/tmp/file) = 53d53ea94217b259c11a5a2d104ec58a

MD5.command: echo "some of this will not make sense at first" | ./ft_ssl md5 /tmp/file
echo "but eventually you will understand" | ./ft_ssl md5 -p -r /tmp/file

MD5.expected_stdout:
("GL HF let's go\n")= d1e3cc342b6da09480b27ec57ff243e2
MD5 ("foo") = acbd18db4cc2f85cedef654fccc4a4d8
MD5 (/tmp/file) = 53d53ea94217b259c11a5a2d104ec58a

MD5.expected_stderr:
ft_ssl: md5: -s: No such file or directory
ft_ssl: md5: bar: No such file or directory

MD5.command: echo "just to be extra clear" | ./ft_ssl md5 -r -q -p -s "foo" /tmp/file
MD5.expected_stdout:
just to be extra clear
3ba35f1ea0d170cb3b9a752e3360286c
acbd18db4cc2f85cedef654fccc4a4d8
53d53ea94217b259c11a5a2d104ec58a

MD5.command: ./ft_ssl md5 -q -s "be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully	be sure to handle edge cases carefully"
